phrases: I could never tell you all I wanted to say.
I think about your faked smile,
and forget all the hot tears we she would.
those empty eyes of yours, reflect, my dear?
hides in a rift in the clouds,
as darkness seeps up from the ground.
that you still sit alone, sighing?
Without you, I just cannot smile.
I know that if I could treasure them and live on,
The summer flowers that bloomed in the sky
Come falling down, dancing in the wind.
I can barely recall the night sky
where they all came tumbling down,
so what I can still recall is all the more precious.
The intertwined fates of men give the Mononoke its Form.
Enter the woman, protecting her child.
Enter the mistress who gives the woman shelter for the night.
Enter the man who seeks the woman.
They all reside beneath the same roof.
A splendid cast, set against the nightly bustle, the splash of drink and the clatter of cups,
and the innocent sound of childrens voices.
Though the voices were clear, the children were absent, except for the one in the womans womb.
The Mononoke is most certainly a Zashikiwarashi,
but where are the Truth and Regret?
There is something within this lodge.
The pregnant girl and this inn
What of the man the Mononoke killed?
To kill me and my unborn child.
Because its father is their heir.
They just suddenly said it could not be, that it was forbidden!
I did not want their property!
I just wanted to give birth!
I do not care if its a Mononoke or a ghost, or what, I
If there is something in this house,
then why do not we just leave?
What on Earth is going on?
How can you be so relaxed?
You Are the one who refuses to talk, madam.
This room was made as an offering to the dead.
What do you mean, an offering?
It was all I could do for them.
This house was once a brothel.
Its a grave for all the children produced.
We were doing them a favor.
The master and mistress will not allow it.
I do not care what happens.
You Will sleep with anyone who has money, right?
I Have finally got a mother.
If you cannot work, you will never pay off your debt.
If you cannot work, you do not eat.
You Are whores, sold to pay a debt!
You cannot do your job with a child in the works.
You Are with child, are you?
The Zashikiwarashi will not come after you!
The Zashikiwarashi wanted to be born!
That Is why they came after you.
Those tied to this room were killed when this was a brothel.

If I find the Regret, the sword can be drawn.
What did those poor children do to you?
It wishes to burst forth from your belly.
It just wants to live in this world!
Ill give birth to you, as well.
You wish to give birth to the Mononoke?
All those within my womb are my children.
I will give birth to my child.
I Am glad it was her.
I Am sorry I had to hurt you so.
Thank you for always trying your best.
Thank you for talking to me so much.
Thank you for choosing me, for coming to me.
I could not be your mother.
Well, I never did eat, did I?
Are you sure I should be your mother?
I hope to see you soon.
